snippet: Home to opulent hotels, secluded coves and some of the sunniest weather in Europe, Hvar appears poised to gain even greater popularity.
abstract: Hvar, an island in the Adriatic Sea off Croatia’s Dalmatian coast, has been popular resort destination for over a century, drawing visitors with its Mediterranean climate and beaches; island is awash in contradictions, offering both luxury hotels and nightclubs as well as secluded spots and inexpensive lodgings.
lead_paragraph: Home to opulent hotels, secluded coves and some of the sunniest weather in Europe, Hvar appears poised to gain even greater popularity.

headline.main: A Croatian Island’s Day in the Sun
headline.print_headline: An Island Jewel’s Day in the Sun
